# AliceToolsEnumArgumentAttribute constructor

Initializes a new instance of [`AliceToolsEnumArgumentAttribute`](../AliceToolsEnumArgumentAttribute.md), and specifies the argument string.

```csharp
public AliceToolsEnumArgumentAttribute(string name = null)
```

## Remarks

`null`*name* will be ignored by AliceToolsArgumentsWriter.
